Class PasswordResetController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.ria.web.PasswordResetController
  • @Controller
@RequestMapping("/password_reset")
public class PasswordResetController
extends Object
    Controller for handling password reset flow

    • Method Detail

      • getResetPage

        @RequestMapping(value="/{resetId}",
                method=GET)
public String getResetPage​(@PathVariable
                           String resetId,
                           @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="false")
                           boolean expired,
                           org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Get the password reset page
        Parameters:
        resetId - The ID of the PasswordReset
        expired - indicates whether we're showing the reset page because of an expired password or a reset request.
        model - A model for the page
        Returns:
        The string name of the page

      • sendNewPassword

        @RequestMapping(value="/{resetId}",
                method=POST)
public String sendNewPassword​(@PathVariable
                              String resetId,
                              @RequestParam
                              String password,
                              @RequestParam
                              String confirmPassword,
                              org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                              Locale locale)
        Send the new password for a given password reset
        Parameters:
        resetId - The ID of the PasswordReset
        password - The new password to set
        confirmPassword - Confirm the new password
        model - A model for the given page
        locale - The locale of the request
        Returns:
        The string name of the success view, or on failure the getResetPage view

      • resetSuccess

        @RequestMapping("/success/{encodedEmail}")
public String resetSuccess​(@PathVariable
                           String encodedEmail,
                           org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Success page for a password reset
        Parameters:
        encodedEmail - A base64 encoded email address
        model - Model for the view
        Returns:
        The password reset success view name

        @RequestMapping(method=GET)
public String noLoginResetPassword​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Get the reset password page
        Parameters:
        model - Model for this view
        Returns:
        The view name for the email entry page

      • submitEmail

        @RequestMapping(method=POST)
public String submitEmail​(@RequestParam
                          String email,
                          org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Create a password reset for the given email address
        Parameters:
        email - The email address to create a password reset for
        model - Model for the view
        Returns:
        Reset created page if the email exists in the system

      • getPasswordReset

        @RequestMapping(value="/activate",
                method=POST)
public String getPasswordReset​(@RequestParam
                               String activationId)
        Get the activation page for the given activation
        Parameters:
        activationId - the activation id
        Returns:
        redirect to the password reset page with the activation id

      • adminNewPasswordReset

        @RequestMapping("/ajax/create/{userId}")
@ResponseBody
@PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\', \'ROLE_MANAGER\')")
public Map<String,​Object> adminNewPasswordReset​(@PathVariable
                                                      Long userId,
                                                      Principal principal,
                                                      Locale locale)
        Create a new PasswordReset for the given User
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of the User
        principal - a reference to the logged in user.
        locale - a reference to the locale specified by the browser.
        Returns:
        a model indicating success or failure of the reset request.

      • canCreatePasswordReset

        public static boolean canCreatePasswordReset​(User principalUser,
                                             User user)
        Test if a user should be able to click the password reset button
        Parameters:
        principalUser - The currently logged in principal
        user - The user being edited
        Returns:
        true if the principal can create a password reset for the user
